com.amazon.speech.speechlet.verifier

Interface SpeechletResponseVerifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardSpeechletResponseVerifier, OutputSpeechSpeechletResponseVerifier, ResponseSizeSpeechletResponseVerifier

    public interface SpeechletResponseVerifier
    Verifier for validating the SpeechletResponseEnvelope received from the Speechlets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean verify(SpeechletResponseEnvelope responseEnvelope, Session session)
      Verifies a SpeechletResponseEnvelope within the context of the Session in which it was received.

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        boolean verify(SpeechletResponseEnvelope responseEnvelope,
             Session session)
        Verifies a SpeechletResponseEnvelope within the context of the Session in which it was received. Returns true if the verify succeeded, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        responseEnvelope - SpeechletResponseEnvelope to verify
        session - Session context within which to verify the call
        Returns:
        true if the verify succeeded, false otherwise
